translations: v.坚持不懈（persevere 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: He perseveres in his work makes us shame.
sentences.translation: 他孜孜不倦的干劲使我们大家惭愧。

sentences.sentence: Although he is in poor health, he still perseveres in his studies.
sentences.translation: 尽管他身体不好，他仍孜孜不倦地学习。

sentences.sentence: It always protects, always trusts, always hope, always perseveres.
sentences.translation: 凡事包容，凡事相信，凡事盼望，凡事坚持。
